column1: @entity2's family lived in a small apartment in @entity0.  One day @entity2 came home from schooland her mom told her that the family was moving to @entity1.  @entity2 was sad to leave herfriends. @entity2 was sad to leave her school.  @entity2 helped her mom pack boxes and cleantheir apartment to get ready for the move.  Soon the day came when @entity2's dad brought alarge truck to the parking lot and all of the family's things were put inside.  @entity2 andher mom rode in their car and her dad drove the truck towards @entity1.  @entity2 loved gettingto eat lots of yummy fast food on the way.  When the family got to their new home in @entity1,@entity2 helped her parents to take all of the boxes into the house.  She loved her newbedroom!  When @entity2 was emptying box of her toys, there was a knock at the door.  It wasa little girl who wanted @entity2 to play! @entity2 was going to like @entity1!
